## Node.js/JavaScript Project Setup

This is a Node.js/JavaScript project scaffolded with npm.

### Quick Start
```bash
npm install
npm start
```

### Project Structure
- `src/` - Application source code
- `package.json` - Project dependencies and scripts
- `.github/` - GitHub-specific files

### Development
Follow the standard npm workflow for development, testing, and deployment.
